summary: All four PWA requirements (REQ-1 through REQ-4) appear to be fully implemented. The diff shows manifest.json, service worker, iOS meta tags in index.html, and references to required icon files. No missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.

missing_requirements.requirement: Service worker is registered in main.tsx or index.html
missing_requirements.reason: The service worker file sw.js exists, but no evidence in the diff shows registration code in main.tsx or index.html. The constraint states main.tsx is immutable, so registration should appear in index.html, but no <script> tag for sw.js registration is visible.
